title: "Gangplank is dead and has been disabled in all queues."
body: So, Gangplank, the focal point of this whole bilgewater event, has been disabled to tie in with his death in the lore, that's a bold strategy Cotton, let's see if it pays off.

replies.body: Im sure its just a bug fix that someone get creative with, otherwise Karthus etc. would be unplayable since the beginning.

Nope, he is not disabled due to a bug. From Riot Jaredan:

_"I'm afraid not. This isn't a response to bugs. It's a response to a pissed off Miss Fortune and a large bomb."_

Yup, murdering Sarah Fortune's parents, and taking her world away from her, was probably the biggest mistake Gangplank ever made. Though he would probably have said his biggest mistake was not putting his shot through the little brat's heart. 

He would have had to have shouted that due to all the noise of his ship exploding around him, though.

Then why isn't Karthus disabled? he has been dead from the start, if undead like Karthus and kalista are allowed then why cant we have just spooky GP available?

Even though this isn't a bugfix, hopefully while in the grave GP will have lots of time to learn how to properly access his ult upgrades from the store.

Checked on the bug fix - looks like it was checked in for 5.15, so it should be fixed with the next patch. 

Edit: To be more specific - this wasn't a fix for Gangplank per se, it is a general fix for secondary currencies in the shop because it is used by the Black Market Brawler mode.  Sorry, didn't mean to lead you on :(
Awww... Any ETA for the 5.15 patch? I wanna blow scurvy seadogs with me trusty barrels and spppppoooookkkkyyyyy gun!
yeah he'll be back trust me he's not dead he's in hiding
someone said his barrels wouldn't die to auto attacks with modifiers - e.g. Draven spinning axe, Nasus Q, so they could get infinite stacks if GP left a barrel somewhere
I believe there was a bug they have to fix with him.
